name: Conversys Technologies Private Limited
description:
Conversys Technologies is founded and headed by technocrats, having 100 man-years of experience in providing Open source and Linux enterprise-class solutions. Conversys focuses on the development and implementation of open source strategies for medium and large sized businesses. We provide custom development and multi-tiered solution in Linux platform. Our services are designed to provide an integrated approach to business strategy with respect to the use of web technology.
With a strong understanding of business combined with the flexibility of a number of platforms, network technologies and programming software, we exceptionally design and implement a comprehensive solution to meet client needs. We thus offer our customers solutions that allow them to work more easily, efficiently and cost-effectively. Our proven solutions enable service providers to quickly and effectively deploy an integrated network capable, and to deliver a range of innovative, new services. We are at the forefront of providing network and computer solutions in local marketplace. The industry is ever changing and with our knowledgeable staff, we are able to address any information systems needs. “Action speaks louder than words.” Conversys works on this mantra. Strategically located in Howrah/Kolkata, West Bengal India, we largely cater offshore clients residing around the world and also in very significant area of local marketplace. As a diverse end-to-end IT solutions provider, Conversys offers a range of expertise aimed at helping customers re-engineer and re-invent their businesses to compete successfully in an ever-changing marketplace, with the final objective of giving clients the competitive edge in the marketplace.
